p1: I was born and raised in Saudi Arabia. For the past few years, I've been living in my favourite place on earth ðŸ—½NYCðŸ—½. p2: Besides work, I enjoy the company of good people and friends. I'm lucky to have a strong community of wonderful people that make New York feel like a small town {smile}
p3: I spend a lot of time around books/music/films as well as being out in nature. The highest I've climbed is ~6,000 meters and the lowest is probably a few 100 meters below surface (hoping to go deeper soon!!)
p4: The vast majority of my worldviews and personality come from travelling. I'm like that person with an accent and face you can't place, but like in ~7 or so languages {smile}
p5: I don't use social media, but would love to connect over email, my email is saleh@alghusson.com
